author: Source: Harwich and Manningtree Standard
title: Stuart Broad holds hands up over no-ball incident against Pakistan - Harwich and Manningtree Standard
text:
Stuart Broad apologised to his team-mates for the no-ball which reprieved Shoaib Malik on the way to his century, as England paid dearly for missed chances against Pakistan. Broad hopes the tourists are still in a feasible position, after their hosts finished day one of the three-Test series on 286 for four at the Sheikh Zayed Cricket Stadium.
 Harwich and Manningtree Standard.
